translation.title: Incredible Things About the Wheel-Turning Monarch

segments.pli: Aṅguttara Nikāya 4
segments.en: Numbered Discourses 4

segments.pli: 13. Bhayavagga
segments.en: 13. Fears

segments.pli: 130. Cakkavattiacchariyasutta
segments.en: 130. Incredible Things About the Wheel-Turning Monarch

segments.pli: “Cattārome, bhikkhave, acchariyā abbhutā dhammā raññe cakkavattimhi.
segments.en: “Mendicants, there are these four incredible and amazing things about a wheel-turning monarch.

segments.pli: Katame cattāro?
segments.en: What four?

segments.pli: Sace, bhikkhave, khattiyaparisā rājānaṃ cakkavattiṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamati, dassanenapi sā attamanā hoti.
segments.en: If an assembly of aristocrats goes to see a wheel-turning monarch, they’re uplifted by seeing him

segments.pli: Tatra ce rājā cakkavattī bhāsati, bhāsitenapi sā attamanā hoti.
segments.en: and uplifted by hearing him speak.

segments.pli: Atittāva, bhikkhave, khattiyaparisā hoti, atha rājā cakkavattī tuṇhī bhavati.
segments.en: And when he falls silent, they’ve never had enough.

segments.pli: Sace, bhikkhave, brāhmaṇaparisā rājānaṃ cakkavattiṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamati, dassanenapi sā attamanā hoti.
segments.en: If an assembly of brahmins …

segments.pli: Tatra ce rājā cakkavattī bhāsati, bhāsitenapi sā attamanā hoti.
Atittāva, bhikkhave, brāhmaṇaparisā hoti, atha rājā cakkavattī tuṇhī bhavati.
Sace, bhikkhave, gahapatiparisā rājānaṃ cakkavattiṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamati, dassanenapi sā attamanā hoti.
segments.en: householders …

segments.pli: Tatra ce rājā cakkavattī bhāsati, bhāsitenapi sā attamanā hoti.
Atittāva, bhikkhave, gahapatiparisā hoti, atha rājā cakkavattī tuṇhī bhavati.
Sace, bhikkhave, samaṇaparisā rājānaṃ cakkavattiṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamati, dassanenapi sā attamanā hoti.
segments.en: or ascetics goes to see a wheel-turning monarch, they’re uplifted by seeing him

segments.pli: Tatra ce rājā cakkavattī bhāsati, bhāsitenapi sā attamanā hoti.
segments.en: and uplifted by hearing him speak.

segments.pli: Atittāva, bhikkhave, samaṇaparisā hoti, atha rājā cakkavattī tuṇhī bhavati.
segments.en: And when he falls silent, they’ve never had enough.

segments.pli: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro acchariyā abbhutā dhammā raññe cakkavattimhi.
segments.en: These are the four incredible and amazing things about a wheel-turning monarch.

segments.pli: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, cattāro acchariyā abbhutā dhammā ānande.
segments.en: In the same way, there are these four incredible and amazing things about Ānanda.

segments.pli: Katame cattāro?
segments.en: What four?

segments.pli: Sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhuparisā ānandaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamati, dassanenapi sā attamanā hoti.
segments.en: If an assembly of monks goes to see Ānanda, they’re uplifted by seeing him

segments.pli: Tatra ce ānando dhammaṃ bhāsati, bhāsitenapi sā attamanā hoti.
segments.en: and uplifted by hearing him speak.

segments.pli: Atittāva, bhikkhave, bhikkhuparisā hoti, atha ānando tuṇhī bhavati.
segments.en: And when he falls silent, they’ve never had enough.

segments.pli: Sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniparisā … pe … sace, bhikkhave, upāsakaparisā … pe … sace, bhikkhave, upāsikāparisā ānandaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamati, dassanenapi sā attamanā hoti.
segments.en: If an assembly of nuns … laymen … or laywomen goes to see Ānanda, they’re uplifted by seeing him

segments.pli: Tatra ce ānando dhammaṃ bhāsati, bhāsitenapi sā attamanā hoti.
segments.en: and uplifted by hearing him speak.

segments.pli: Atittāva, bhikkhave, upāsikāparisā hoti, atha ānando tuṇhī bhavati.
segments.en: And when he falls silent, they’ve never had enough.

segments.pli: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro acchariyā abbhutā dhammā ānande”ti.
segments.en: These are the four incredible and amazing things about Ānanda.”

segments.pli: Dasamaṃ.
Bhayavaggo tatiyo.
Attānuvādaūmi ca,
dve ca nānā dve ca honti;
Mettā dve ca acchariyā,
aparā ca tathā duveti.

sections.title: “Mendicants, there are these four incredible and amazing things…

suttaplex.blurb: Monks, nuns, laywomen, and laymen love to hear Dharma from Ānanda.
